Sodium (Na)

Description

Originating from salt and soda, sodium is a soft alkali metal discovered back in 1807, which is quickly soluble when in the presence of air. Sodium can be used for food and drink. It is also one of Earthâ€™s most common elements, with salt being a prominent feature of seawater.
